title: Will you require 'the national code for the mask' or the red mask or the blue mask?
subtitle: Any publication that has become viral to claim people is unspecialized must wear red masks and face a series of constraints during the Corona virus epidemic.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: According to the National Mask Act, unpurified persons will have to wear red masks, be banned from travelling, voting and trading, and be subject to three months of closure. People who wash blue masks and are allowed to travel, organized commerce, automatic voting and required social isolation are dressed.
